Attributes.description: Written and oral communication in business correspondence, engineering design methods, report preparation, and oral presentations of technical material. Restricted to students in second year of the Materials Engineering Program.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of APSC 176, ENGL 110, ENGL 111, ENGL 112, ENGL 120, ENGL 121, WRDS 150.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 10:30, Building: Frank, Room: Forward
